articles.description: Carlos Alcaraz powers to victory over an out-of-sorts Novak Djokovic to retain his men's singles title at Wimbledon.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2024 results: Carlos Alcaraz beats Novak Djokovic in men's final to keep title

articles.description: Follow live updates of the fourth and final round of the Scottish Open at the Renaissance Club, East Lothian.
articles.title: The Scottish Open final round - live updates - BBC Sport

articles.description: Manchester United sign Bologna and Netherlands striker Joshua Zirkzee in a deal worth £36.54m.
articles.title: Joshua Zirkzee: Manchester United sign Bologna striker in £36.54m deal

articles.description: Tadej Pogacar takes a huge step towards reclaiming the Tour de France title as he claims a second straight stage win.
articles.title: Tour de France 2024: Tadej Pogacar claims another dominant win on stage 15

articles.description: England's Euro 2024 final against Spain is a game that can shape legacies and change lives forever, says BBC Sport chief football writer Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Gareth Southgate: "England boss inherited a shambles but is one win from greatness'

articles.description: Former captain Gary Lineker on his long wait to utter the words "England are champions", as Gareth Southgate's side prepare to face Spain in the final of Euro 2024.
articles.title: Euro 2024 final: 'England will lift a major trophy soon but I don’t want to wait' - Gary Lineker

articles.description: Briton Alfie Hewett completes a career Grand Slam by lifting the Wimbledon men's singles title with a convincing win over Spain's Martin de la Puente on Court One.
articles.title: Wimbledon wheelchair final: Briton Alfie Hewett completes career Grand Slam with win

articles.description: As Spain bid for their first major men's tournament triumph since 2012, Guillem Balague looks at how a "special team" was built.
articles.title: Euro 2024 final, Spain v England: 'Luis de la Fuente knew team were special and nation now believes too'

articles.description: Former Baltimore Ravens wide receiver and Super Bowl winner Jacoby Jones dies aged 40.
articles.title: Jacoby Jones: Super Bowl winner with Baltimore Ravens dies aged 40

articles.description: Argentina will be bidding for an outright record 16th Copa America title when they face Colombia in Monday's final.
articles.title: Argentina v Colombia: Lionel Messi and co set for Copa America final
